readme:
# Evening Syntax

A simple dark syntax theme for [Atom](https://atom.io/).

[Evening UI theme](https://atom.io/themes/evening-ui) also available.

#### Preview
![Screenshot of Evening theme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sixsqr/evening-syntax/master/screenshot_01.png)
